bugs.description: Filter chips for specific coin types (e.g., '2022 American Silver Eagle Special Proof BU') only apply exact matches instead of showing all variations of the coin type.
stepsToReproduce: Click on a specific coin type chip (e.g., '2022 American Silver Eagle Special Proof BU').
Observe that the filter only applies to the exact match and does not include other variations of the coin type.
bugs.impact: Users cannot view all variations of a coin type when clicking on a filter chip, leading to incomplete search results.
